title: OOL LFM
body:
Prince e-Sports is currently looking for members for our OOL Main Roster. 

We would like you to be D2+ and have past competitive experience. We have very strong infrastructure and a healthy, development orientated team environment. To attract a team of like-minded individuals, there will be financial incentives available for players. We are looking to build a strong team whose goal is to compete at the top of OOL.

We are also seeking a **Jungler** for our Academy team. We would like you to be D3+ and have the ability to take criticism and learn. Competitive experience is a big bonus.

We are also seeking a **Manager **for both teams. Previous experience is highly regarded.

Similarly, we are currently seeking **Coaches** for our organisation. Once again past competitive experience is highly sought after. Financial Incentives are also available for the right candidates.

If interested, you can contact me in-client, or go to our website and apply there.

Thanks for reading.

http://www.princeesports.com

replies.body: Add me %%%%, I'm a smurf. Check me win rates on this account. Look forward to hearing from you.
Princè here give me a spot
